mapper.select: select c.name,sc.course_num,sc.course_index,c.school,t.name as teacher from single_course sc inner join course c on c.number = sc.course_num inner join teacher t on t.number = sc.teacher inner join select_course sc2 on sc2.course = sc.course_num and sc2.course_index = sc.course_index where sc2.student = #{number}

select c.name,sc.course_num,sc.course_index,c.school,t.name as teacher from single_course sc inner join course c on c.number = sc.course_num inner join teacher t on t.number = sc.teacher where sc.teacher = #{number}
select t.number,t.name,t.school,t.title from single_course sc inner join teacher t on t.number = sc.teacher where sc.course_num = #{number} and sc.course_index = #{index}
select * from student s inner join select_course sc on sc.student = s.number where sc.course = #{number} and sc.course_index = #{index}
